column4: Hi, I have an unfinilized cd-rom with images on that I want to try to recover. It's unmountable so how can I read from it?
there are forensics software you may wish to try, as well as disk-utility. anyone else?
you saw it :) I have the tools but no access to disk
does that cd mount on windows
where did you get this mystery disk?
go finalize it on nero, i have no idea.
It doesn't mount anywhere, it is not finilized but from what I understand the data is on there. It is made in Nero on windows
...and maybe it will mount in Nero but non o my 5 PC have that other OS
Ha! there is nero for linux! Downloading now.... :)
i heard about that before. tried it, didnt work on ubuntu at the time, gave up. had other ways to burn dvd/cds, mainly cmdline
it installed fine on my opensuse box, now to try to finilize disk
